summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4310 for the improvement of Sunset Avenue from West Holgate Street to the northerly line of Lot 22, Block 26, Replat of West Seattle Park; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51169, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
